attributes.action: Stop politicians who have never served in the forces commenting on war.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am tired of seeing mp's from all parties, commenting and giving their expert opinion of all things that our brave lads, putting their lives on their lives do. These people who have only ever risked their lives by getting on the tube are in no position to comment, nor give an opinion how the lads out there should behave. To have an opinion MP's you should have at least done basic training, not sixth form.
